This folder contains external tools that are embedded here for simplicity.
We list here the corresponding authors and details:

* Tools for NIfTI and ANALYZE image
  Jimmy Shen
  http://www.mathworks.com/matlabcentral/fileexchange/8797-tools-for-nifti-and-analyze-image

* Forward-backward solvers with FISTA-like accelaration
  Rafael Carrillo
  http://people.epfl.ch/rafael.carrillo
